text:
@realDonaldTrump Your nepotistic son in law Jared Kushner has failed at coronavirus response team, the Mideast Peace process, the Office of American Innovation, ...
What does he have to do to get fired?
Isn't that what you were famous for on The Apprentice?

https://t.co/L8HpvYCKWe
